title: Swap Mission mascot image to uploaded asset

requirements.summary: Replace the Mission section mascot image src to use the uploaded .webp asset via the existing base-aware assetPath() helper, without changing layout or other images.
acceptanceCriteria: The mascot image currently using assetPath('assets/generated/zen-mascot-logo.dim_512x512.png') is replaced to use assetPath('assets/generated/image-1.webp') (or assetPath('assets/generated/image-2.webp') if that is the intended replacement), without changing surrounding layout or other sections.

The uploaded image file used by the exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/.webp and loads correctly in both local dev and IC deployments served from a subpath (i.e., no hard-coded leading '/' in the src).
Only the selected element in the Mission section is changed (no other images on the page are modified).

file_operations.description: Add the user-uploaded mascot replacement image to the generated assets directory so it can be referenced via assetPath('assets/generated/image-1.webp') and loaded base-aware in all deployments.

Add the alternate user-uploaded mascot replacement image (if provided/needed) to the generated assets directory to allow switching to assetPath('assets/generated/image-2.webp') without introducing hard-coded paths.
